item.description:
Let's all come together as a community and enjoy each other's company. Please join us for a special Prudential meetup. We'll be meeting from 2:30pm in the Prudential food court.

Those who would like to may also join us earlier for lunch in Chinatown. We will be meeting at 12:00pm by the Chinatown gate, and walking over to Hei La Moon. (www.heilamoon.com)
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be at our usual location in the back of the Prudential Food Court.
item.why: Given the events of the past few days, let's all come together as a community and enjoy each other's company.
item.name: Special Meetup: Sunday at Prudential
